content:
Certainly! Here are some example advertising taglines and phrases you could use to promote your home package drop-box with open/close notifications:

1. "Never miss a package again with our secure drop-box!"
2. "Protect your packages with our state-of-the-art home delivery solution."
3. "Say goodbye to porch pirates with our secure package drop-box."
4. "Get package delivery peace of mind with our drop-box and notifications."
5. "Keep your packages safe and secure with our innovative home delivery solution."
6. "Effortlessly receive packages at home with our easy-to-use drop-box."
7. "Say goodbye to the hassle of missed deliveries with our convenient and secure drop-box."
8. "Protect your packages and the planet with our eco-friendly home delivery solution."
9. "Modernize your package deliveries with our cutting-edge drop-box technology."
10. "Secure, convenient, and eco-friendly: Get all three with our home package drop-box."

Remember to keep your messaging clear, concise, and impactful, and tailor it to your target audience's specific pain points and needs. Good luck with your advertising!
